pkgmetadata.longdescription: Functions for the Book "An Introduction to the Bootstrap" // Software (bootstrap, cross-validation, jackknife) and data for the book "An Introduction to the Bootstrap" by B. Efron and R. Tibshirani, 1993, Chapman and Hall. _____________________________________________________________ This package is primarily provided for projects already based on it, and for support of the book. New projects should preferentially use the recommended package "boot".
